SEARCH
Package com.dhk.controller

Interface Controller

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplyDisplayModeButtonController, ClearAllButtonController, ClearHotKeyButtonController, ConnectedDisplaysController, DhkController, DisplayModeController, DpiScaleController, ExitButtonController, FrameDragController, HotKeysController, MenuController, MinimizeButtonController, MinimizeToTrayButtonController, NumberOfSlotsController, OrientationController, PaypalDonateButtonController, RefreshAppButtonController, RunOnStartupButtonController, ScalingModeController, SelectedDisplayController, ThemeButtonController, WindowController
public interface Controller
This interface defines a controller. Controllers must have an initController method, an initListeners method, and a cleanUp method.
Version:
1.5.1
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2025
